price: Wͻbεka sε: ”Kronkron hene ne Wo (Awurade)! Wone yεn Kyitaafoͻ na εnyε wͻn ne (yεn kyitaafoͻ). Daabi, na wͻsom Jinnfoͻ no, na wͻn na wͻn mu dodoͻ no ara gyee wͻn diiε”.
arabic: قَالُواْ سُبۡحَٰنَكَ أَنتَ وَلِيُّنَا مِن دُونِهِمۖ بَلۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡبُدُونَ ٱلۡجِنَّۖ أَكۡثَرُهُم بِهِم مُّؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qālū sub'ḥānaka anta waliyyunā min dūnihim bal kānū yaʿbudūna al-jina aktharuhum bihim mu'minūna
